sections.PURPOSE: of this training is to familiarize Hammer Troop Drivers/VC/Crews on maneuvering their Strykers through various types of terrain at night IOT prepare them for in future training environments.
sections.KEY TASKS:
All vehicles/ crews pass PCC/PCI Inspection.
All vehicles/crews possess require marshalling/TRM paperwork.
All vehicles/ crews successfully meet time hacks.
sections.END STATE: All Hammer Troop vehicle crews have successfully passed and conducted a marshalling RXL prior to future TRMs.
sections.MISSION:
3/2CR, HHT conducts marshalling preparation on 30MAY25 IOT to familiarize vehicle crews with marshalling procedures and prepare Hammer TRP for future Troop TRMs.
